评论详情: We got this for family pictures, size matched perfect, the quality is great, nice thickness for warm and super soft and comfortable. Had a nice clean look.
The fit was perfect and true to size. Great quality material.
My son loves it! Perfect wearing alone or layered. Arrived quickly too! Thank you ☺️
Other colors fit like they were supposed to but this one is very tight everywhere
Very thick and soft sweater. Only complaint is how wrinkled it came.
Wrinkles will not come out after hanging for days

评论概述: Beautiful, high quality, thick warm sweater
评论详情: I got this for my husband and I nearly stole it from him when I took it from the package. This sweater is thick, soft, and plush. It fits my husband well even with his 6’3” build. This sweater stretches and layers really well if you’re more inclined to wear with a collard button up underneath. The arms and torso are a great length and I think the color of this is beautiful. It washes well in cold water and lay flat to dry. I’ve had no shrinking issues with this method. I have no complaints about this sweater and only wish we had another one so I didn’t have to steal his!
Soft, nice color and looks more expensive than it is.
I like everything,very soft and pleasant
Nice sweater, good quality!

I received this sweater hoping it was as described but I received a shiny sweater that was mixed with some kind of material that made this sweater super shiny in light I felt like I was a strobe light walking around buyer beware I'm very disappointed with company after spending so much money with them. Please do a product check before sending out defective items to paying customers, so disappointed in your company. Will never buy again this is the third different product that I bought with major defects
This was a nice shirt for family pictures and my son actually liked it.

A simple lightweight sweater, but nice enough quality. It looks and fits just as expected, and it should hold up well to long-term use. I like the look and the color, and it's perfect for everyday use. No complaints here!
Love the shirt. Color and fit was a perfect match with my boots.
Was very tight when worn
It's a good dress sweater.  The sleeves are stitched with an embellishment I don't care for.  But overall it's a good sweater for the price.  Looks good with chinos and dress shoes.
Nice sweater But sizes ran a little small in the 3 XL
love it
fits well and looks good

Got this as a gift for my husband and he loved it. The fabric is very soft and comfortable to wear. I did notice a little bit of shrinkage so maybe size up. The fabric is not thick but it’s warm to wear under a coat or jacket. It’s a well made sweater.
like colour dislike nothing
Good finish, firm seams, good material, good cost benefit. I recommend it to everyone.

This is a nice sweater. You can dress it up or down. Very versatile. I like the material. It is soft and comfortable to wear. It fits true to size with some stretch. Washes well in the machine. I did hang dry it to avoid shrinkage.
Very nice . Liked the color . Nice . Looks like a quality sweater . Dosent look cheap . Perfect for what I bought it for .

This is not my first Coofandy clothing item, and they are both exceeding my expectations. The other is a long sleeve shirt.  Let me lead with this comment. This FITS a guy with Long arms!! I am 6'4", 208# with long legs and arms. According to how they measure, I have a 44" chest, about 20" shoulders and 29" arms. For a dress shirt I would measure from my spine and then my "sleeve" would be 38".  This Sweater says the XXL is a 48.3" Bust (chest?) 19.4" Shoulders and 26.4" arm. Both in reality and as you can see from the pictures, it fits me well. I think it is very possible that I could have gotten just an XL and it would then have been a Trim fit but STILL fit in the arms. I am not sure though.  I got this sweater just before I went to Ireland for a vacation, so I chose a couple real life photos instead of posed ones. As you can see, the sleeves are the perfect length and the fit is good and not real baggy even though this is the XXL. As far as feel, weight, quality, and fabric, it is all really good. I have washed the sweater a couple times and it has held up fine. It felt nice without an undershirt, and fit fine with one as well. Now that I have even more experience with this brand, I am even more confident that I DO recommend this sweater, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another. I might even buy the XL and see how it fits...

评论概述: Can't go wrong with this brand
评论详情: Take my money ... these guys make some really good stuff .

The size fit is spot on. The elastic around the tail and wrist keep it in the right spots. The knit is tight and smooth so it is plenty warm for its weight. I'll update later in the winter after some wear and washes.

This is a pretty well made sweater. It looks good, and it's a nice weight. There's not really anything wrong with it. It's not a super stylish sweater and I always prefer a softer fabric, but this is plenty pleasant and is something that will look good by itself or over dress shirt for work. It will be in my rotation this fall/winter for sure. It's easy to do both casual and business casual with this one.
Nice to wear business and casual, Coofandy has lots of great clothing for men
Great men’s knit dressy sweater. Got this for my husband and it looks great on him. Basic black sweater is a must have in any man’s wardrobe. Material is soft and lightweight.

评论概述: Coofandy: The new sleeper luxury brand
评论详情: So Coofandy, despite the goofy sounding name, is kind of the bomb company now. This is my third product from them and I haven't been disappointed even once. The quality offered is typically found on products at least twice this price.  I haven't had any loose strands on any of them and they all just have a solid feeling to them. This sweater is no exception. It feels well made. Soft, comfortable, and it stretches well. The color and size were both spot on. It will layer well come winter.  I'm loving Coofandy products. This sweater is awesome.

Fabric is soft, flexible, breathable, comfortable and not cheap looking synthetics. The material is thick/heavy for outdoor fall weather and the weave is tight not letting any wind in. Fit is good and the length is long so ideal to wear with a long sleeve T/shirt and jeans. It's solid without being unreasonably heavy or too thin, good addition to fall/winter wardrobe. This looks/feels like a high quality sweater, can also be used as a unisex sweater, highly recommend.

评论概述: very high quality.  Runs slightly small
评论详情: Bought this for my teen son in a large who normally wears a small or medium - it fits him perfectly. So I would say to size up one size unless you like the slim fit look.  He loves it - it's very well made and will last a long time.

I picked this up for my husband, and it's great.  The sizing is good. He normally wears medium, but I sized up so that it would work well as an outer layer. The fit is nice, even with the upsize, it's not oversized.  The fabris is soft and comfortable, and it seems quite warm. The construction is good, with no uneven stitches, snags, or other issues. It washed well, and it has not pilled.

评论概述: Looks great, warm and VERY comfortable!
评论详情: It is a slim fit - I'm 5'10" / 180lbs and fit - a large and it fits PERFECTLY, feels fantastic, and looks great in many different settings. I will be ordering more of these to wear over a dress shirt in the cold office that I work in, and over a T-shirt for morning / evening dog-walks when the temps are in the low 60f / 15.5c range.
Great all purpose sweater for my teen son. Will work well with winter layering here in Alaska.  Well made with good fit, true to size.  Recommended.

This is a really great quality sweater and really great fit. It’s form fitting without being too much. My husband really likes it, he can put a T-shirt under, but he can also wear it without anything under. The material itself, very soft and it does really well in a wash. I would just recommend turning it inside out to prevent piling and washing on gentle cycle cold and then low heat on drying. The color itself is really flattering, this particular blue is a really nice pleasant color for every day, but I can also go right under a blazer or a coat. Overall, highly recommend this for fall, early winter and spring.
if you’re looking to brighten up your wardrobe, this winter consider getting one of their crewnecks. They have a wide range of colors and they’re very warm. I highly recommend them.
I love the way this sweater feels. It's got a soft ultra comfy feel to it. It fits right and looks fantastic. I did not see any type of fabric pulls so this is a quality product.  Grade: A

I ordered this sweater in red for my husband, who is 6'5" with an athletic build. The XL size fits him perfectly. Overall, the sweater is well-made, with soft fabric and an amazing color. Given the price point, we're planning to order it in a few additional colors. Highly recommend!

I liked the look of this sweater in the listing photos so I decided to give it a try. First off the sweater comes vacuum sealed so be mindful that it comes incredibly wrinkled. The photos in my review are right out the package so it looks very wrinkled but once I ironed it out it looks so much better. I fits perfectly. The arms and body fit just right and are the perfect length. The sweater is super soft and has some stretch to it. It looks really great with a dress shirt underneath. Overall I'm very happy with this sweater and look forward to wearing it out!

This sweater is just wonderful! I got it for my husband in his normal size, XL. It fits perfectly, the blue color is a little darker than displayed, but still gorgeous and the fabric is warm and very, very soft. It feels great against the skin. My husband was delighted to try it on and is looking forward to fall and winter to wear it, given it's a fairly thick knit. We totally recommend it.  It's a fantastic value for the price.

I have worn different items from this brand in the past, and they do not disappoint.  This is a very nice and well made sweater, that fits perfectly to size.  The colors are nice and the material is well made as well.  This is a nice addition to my closet.

I ordered this sweater for my 98-year-old father-in-law who is always cold!  It could be 95 degrees outside and he still is cold!  This sweater keeps him nice and warm and it looks awesome.  The material is soft and is made with excellent production values.  He loves it!  I would highly recommend this sweater and at this price point I will be ordering more of these in different colors.

I ordered this sweater for my son and it's great. It is true to size and fits him well. The knit is of a high quality, and it is very soft and comfortable. The color is beautiful, as well. He wants me to order him more in other colors, and I may order a few for myself, as well. Highly recommend!

The COOFANDY Men's Crew Neck Dress Sweater is a soft and breathable knitted sweater that is perfect for casual or business casual occasions. The sweater size I ordered is a size large in color black and the fit is true to size. What I like about this dress sweater is that the material is thick and has some weight to it. I was honestly expecting the material of this sweater to be thin but it is not. I also like that the neck collar isn't loose and is quite taut around the neck which eliminates a sloppy look. The sweater can definitely keep you warm during the fall to winter season. Overall, I am satisfied with the quality of this sweater. I've ordered a lot of items from COOFANDY and the quality of their products never disappoint. I would definitely recommend this sweater if you're looking for a stylish outfit.  Pros ✅ Excellent Quality Sweater ✅ Thick Material ✅ Fits True To Size  Cons ⛔️ None
Pensé que sería más abrigador, pero es más ideal para temperaturas de 20°C (dependiendo de la persona). La tela es suave, de buena calidad y se siente cómoda sobre la piel.
el material se percibe muy sencillo, lo compré con descuento pero por el precio normal, se puede encontrar algun modelo mejor.
